item.description:
Afterwork Mixer for young professionals alike in the heart of Boston's Back Bay district.

The Afterwork Mixer returns Thursday June 15th 6-9 pm. This time we are taking the party to the roof deck. The weather is looking to be around 75 degrees sunny so come and have a few cocktails with the group as we gear up for another festive weekend!

Meeting Details: We will meet on the roof deck (hence the title). If by chance there is rain we will meet on the first level. This place is packed on Thurs nites so I ENCOURAGE you to attend early as possible. My picture is on the site so I should not be hard to find. My phone is 617-671-5310. Please make note prior to arriving.

See you there !

Steven

384 Boylston St. Boston MA 02116

Public Transportation:

Green Line to Arlington
Orange Line to Back Bay

For more information, see http://rattlesnakebar...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Party on the Roof Deck Afterwork Mixer !
